haloalkane (obtained from hydrocarbon by substituting halogen for hydrogen, e.g. chlorobenzene or the CFCs)

sentences.english: Low smoke, zero halogen flame retardant sheath.
sentences.chinese: 低烟无卤阻燃护套，环保。

sentences.english: Heating in low temperature could prolong the shelf-life of the spiced beef in a certain extent.
sentences.chinese: 低温加热灭菌可在一定程度上延长卤牛肉的货架期。

sentences.english: Halogen atoms contain seven electrons in their valence shell.
sentences.chinese: 卤原子在它们的介电子层含有七个电子。

sentences.english: The dead cysts in the collection of Barkol Lake were mainly emerged in spring.
sentences.chinese: 巴里坤湖成品卤虫卵中的死卵主要产生在春季。

sentences.english: Copper conductor XLPE insulated low-smoke and non-halo sheathed Flame-retardant power cable.

sentences.english: Low smoke, zero halogen and flame retardant sheath.
sentences.chinese: 低烟无卤阻燃护套，环保。

sentences.english: The non-halogen fire retardant area is the development direction in Japan up to date and in the future.
sentences.chinese: 非卤阻燃是日本阻燃技术近年及今后的发展方向。

sentences.english: This paper discussed the relationship between laser irradiation time and hatching rate of ArtemIa eggs.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了激光照射时间与卤虫卵孵化率之间的关系。

sentences.english: But so far, no perfect methods are available for estimating the resources of deep-seated subsurface brines.
sentences.chinese: 但对深层地下卤水资源量的评价，尚无完善的方法。

sentences.english: To obtain excellent flame retardant properties of halogen-free flame-retardant plastic film.
sentences.chinese: 以期获得具有优良阻燃性能的无卤阻燃塑料薄膜。

sentences.english: Artemia cysts have been applied in aquiculture, and its quality is very important.
sentences.chinese: 卤虫卵已经普遍应用于水产养殖业，其质量至关重要。

sentences.english: This is roast beef; that is pork chops.
Amines can engage in nucleophile substitution reaction with alky.
sentences.chinese: 胺能参加与卤代烷的亲核取代反应。

sentences.english: I believe love is like pickled pig feet.
sentences.chinese: 我相信爱就像卤猪脚一样。

sentences.english: If the pepper into the soup directly in the brewed halogen, time should be longer.
sentences.chinese: 如果是直接将花椒入汤卤中熬制，时间则应较长。

sentences.english: Trihalomethanes, for instance, can increase the risk of miscarriage.
sentences.chinese: 例如可能增加流产的危险的三卤甲烷。
